description:
No, this is not an Edge video. Here is the scoop.
I went around and around with Maverick, trying to get him to keep coming back. We discussed all the ways he could get blown by a dude. I had him sold on the G:hOle series, but then he started asking about "that blindfold and headphone" scene.
He was comitting to doing something, and I didn't have the heart to tell him that an Edge video means that we would need to push his limits beyond "just a blowjob." I just wanted him in the door getting his dick sucked so I wasn't about to tell him I might rub my cock on him.
So this is more like a Serviced video, but with the blindfold and headphones.
And I gotta tell ya, though he was nervous, this is one real video. The video has one cut where I stopped to move one camera closer. If you love watching a guy start of completely soft, then man-handled to erection, you will love this.
I was completely unaware of how much footage we got. I got him hard, kept him hard, and at the first sign that he was gonna bust, I made him cum. Once I had the inertia, I wasn't gonna ease up! If you look closely a HUGE glop of cum drops out of my mouth. It's pretty dang hot.
That Maverick, he's a shooter!
title: Bryan & Maverick - Edge
